channel.title: How do i let other ppl get on my server
channel.description: well i got a server is running i got no-ip i got hamachi since i have a router whats my ip should be my computer ip or the ip that no-ip give me or the one that hamachi give me is confuseing me lol.

item.title: How do i let other ppl get on my server
item.dc:creator: @tim_moughtin tim_moughtin
item.description:
@tim_moughtin wrote:

ok i will tell you:

for other people to connect OUSIDE YOUR NETWORK like your friends, you tell them to connect using the no-ip

if you yourself are connecting and you are running the server yourself connect using the ip 0.0.0.0

Read full topic
